title: Dinnerbone: 将退出Minecraft团队
author: obby825
txt_content:
Dinnerbone:
Hello! Sorry I didn't reply to this thread earlier, I was asleep.
I announced that I had decided to leave the Minecraft team some months ago, and this was just a reminder to that one person who wanted minecraft stuff from me.
The smiley face was a smiley face, it doesn't need too much reading into. I like smiley faces.
I still work for Mojang. I am still currently working on a Minecraft related thing - rewriting the launcher in c++. This will be done soon and then I'm moving on to a non-minecraft related project, still at Mojang.
I still love you all. <3

Dinnerbone:
嗨！抱歉我之前没有回复这个帖子，因为我之前在睡觉。
我在几个月前就已经宣布决定离开Minecraft团队，而这次只是为了提醒某个想让我向Minecraft添加新东西的人。
这个笑脸就是一个笑脸，没有更多的意思。我喜欢笑脸。
我依然为Mojang工作。我正在工作于和Minecraft有关的事——用C++重写启动器。这不久就会完成，而那个时候我将转向与Minecraft无关的项目，但依然在Mojang。
我依然爱你们。<3



https://www.reddit.com/r/Minecraft/comments/46o3j1/i_dont_work_on_minecraft_anymore_dinnerbone_on/d06zee3

replies.author: tdiant
replies.txt_content:
MOJANG如何拖延1.9 正式版：
1.常用手段——发快照，造BUG
2.搞大新闻——吐显卡，临时猫
3.逼运营商——断网线，掐光纤
4.入ＡＣＧ——分个P，分呀分
5.大杀手锏——晚餐骨，退ＭＣ
MOJANG——先搞快照造BUG，为了脱9逼运营商，快照改名叫分P，最后坑卖好队友。Minecon放视频吊胃口，发布快照减性能。

心机婊——MOJANG
